comments.body: If attached is specified the attachment status should be allowed to change as the docs state. Filtering by an instance_id and device_index that have yet to be attached is unexpected behavior.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +510,514 @@            filters['subnet-id'] = subnet_id

        if not attached and instance_id and device_index:
            filters['attachment.instance-id'] = instance_id
            filters['attachment.device-index'] = device_index
